item.title: Alyce add a quote by Johnny Depp
item.description: "You gotta be careful: don't say a word to nobody about nothing anytime ever." -- Johnny Depp

item.title: Alyce add a quote by Banksy
item.description: "I need someone to protect me from all the measures they take in order to protect me. " -- Banksy

item.title: Alyce add a quote by Sylvia Plath
item.description: "Perhaps some day I'll crawl back home, beaten, defeated. But not as long as I can make stories out of my heartbreak, beauty out of sorrow." -- Sylvia Plath

item.title: Alyce add a quote by Sylvia Plath
item.description: "Here I am, a bundle of past recollections and future dreams, knotted up in a reasonably attractive bundle of flesh. I remember what this flesh has gone through; I dream of what it may go through." -- Sylvia Plath

item.title: Alyce add a quote by Sylvia Plath
item.description: "Life was not to be sitting in hot amorphic leisure in my backyard idly writing or not writing, as the spirit moved me. It was, instead, running madly, in a crowded schedule, in a squirrel cage of busy people. Working, living, dancing, dreaming, talking, kissing- singing, laughing, learning." -- Sylvia Plath

item.title: Alyce add a quote by Ted Hughes
item.description: "There is no better way to know us Than as two wolves, come separately to a wood." -- Ted Hughes

item.title: Alyce add a quote by Sylvia Plath
item.description: "I wanted to be where nobody I knew could ever come." -- Sylvia Plath

item.title: Alyce add a quote by Sylvia Plath
item.description: "Not easy to state the change you made. If I'm alive now, I was dead, Though, like a stone, unbothered by it." -- Sylvia Plath

item.title: Alyce add a quote by Sylvia Plath
item.description: "When they asked me what I wanted to be I said I didn't know." -- Sylvia Plath

item.title: Alyce add a quote by Sylvia Plath
item.description: "If you dissect a bird / to diagram the tongue, / you'll cut the chord / articulating song." -- Sylvia Plath

item.title: Alyce add a quote by Sylvia Plath
Alyce add a quote by Sylvia Plath
item.description: "We are not what we might be; what we are / Outlaws all extrapolation / Beyond the interval of now and here: / White whales are gone with the white ocean." -- Sylvia Plath

item.title: Alyce add a quote by George MacDonald
item.description: "Could you not give me some sign, or tell me something about you that never changes, or some other way to know you, or thing to know you by?" — "No, Curdie: that would be to keep you from knowing me. You must know me in quite another way from that. It would not be the least use to you or me either if I were to make you know me in that way. It would be but to know the sign of me — not to know me myself." -- George MacDonald

item.title: Alyce add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Once you make a decision, the universe conspires to make it happen." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Alyce add a quote by Ray Bradbury
item.description: "If you want to write, if you want to create, you must be the most sublime fool that God ever turned out and sent rambling. You must write every single day of your life. You must read dreadful dumb books and glorious books, and let them wrestle in beautiful fights inside your head, vulgar one moment, brilliant the next. You must lurk in libraries and climb the stacks like ladders to sniff books like perfumes and wear books like hats upon your crazy heads. I wish you a wrestling match with your Creative Muse that will last a lifetime. I wish craziness and foolishness and madness upon you. May you live with hysteria, and out of it make fine stories — science fiction or otherwise. Which finally means, may you be in love every day for the next 20,000 days. And out of that love, remake a world." -- Ray Bradbury

item.title: Alyce add a quote by Jack Kerouac
item.description: "Nothing behind me, everything ahead of me, as is ever so on the road." -- Jack Kerouac
